WorkItem.Description:
I want to use the WSUS Package Publisher to push out EMET around my business, but my WSUS Server uses a non standard port of 11443 instead of 443 or the 8531.

The port options when connecting to my server gives me only a drop down box.  

Why can this not just be an input box?  Is there a manual way I can specify my port somewhere?

Much appreciated.
WorkItem.Summary: I have a non-standard SSL port for WSUS

Comments.Message:
Ok, I see your problem. The workaround, for now, is to run WPP directly on the Wsus server and checking the checkbox "Connect to Local Server" (you can choose any connection port, it will not be used).

Send me an email at package.publisher@free.fr, I will send you a new release where you will be able to enter a non-standard port.

Hi JSpud, I have made some changes in WPP, but I can't test thoroughly because I don't have Wsus server with non-standard port.
Can you send me a email at package.publisher@free.fr 
I will send you this fixed release and you will be able to tell me if it fix the issue.

Thanks
